Posts.Content:
I wrote a song for my wife last year as she was recovering from a cancer surgery. You can hear the song at 
 - Just click on "Music", & choose "Better days". I hope it encourages you! YOu can also download it for free if you want.
Posts.Title: A song I wrote for my wife....

Posts.Content: HI Gail & Tammy. Thank you for taking a listen, & thank you for encouraging me.

Posts.Content: Thanks Anthi! Please pass the link on to others that are experiencing tough times.
